Class ClientUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ClientUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientUnit
extends java.lang.Thread
    ServerUnit object manages all communication between this client and the server. After standard files and lists setup, this Thread constantly listens to new packets (in ListeningThread) and looks for local files' changes. This object is used by ClientSceneController

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Field Detail

      • lockOut

        public java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock lockOut
        Lock to the OutputObjectStream, so sending a file can be delegated.

      • lockLog

        public java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock lockLog
        Lock to the TextField displaying logs.

      • outputStream

        public java.io.ObjectOutputStream outputStream

      • listeningThread

        public java.lang.Thread listeningThread

      • userListView

        public com.jfoenix.controls.JFXListView<java.lang.String[]> userListView
        A list of registered users from the server. Holds the username (index 0) and status (online/offline; index [1]) It's linked with JFXListView in ClientSceneController

      • observableFilesList

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> observableFilesList
        A list of all the user's files, by filenames. No folders. It's linked with JFXListView in ClientSceneController

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientUnit

        public ClientUnit(int port,
                  java.lang.String username,
                  java.io.File userDir,
                  com.jfoenix.controls.JFXListView<java.lang.String[]> userListView,
                  javafx.scene.control.TextField logTF)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructor of this object. Created the users' list, identifies to the server, synchronizes files and starts the ListeningThread Thread. All parameters can't be null.
        Parameters:
        port - The number of local port. Can't be invalid.
        username - User's name, by which they're identified by the server.
        userDir - User's chosen directory.
        userListView - List of the registered users from server.
        logTF - TextField used in ClientSceneController to display logs.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown when there are connectivity issues.

    • Method Detail

      • sendFile

        public void sendFile(java.io.File file,
                     java.lang.String recipientName,
                     PacketObject.PACKET_TYPE packetType)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a PacketObject object, containing a file to send to user's remote directory.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to be sent.
        recipientName - The user that the packet affects.
        packetType - Type of the message, that the packet brings.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when the object couldn't be send due to stream error. Contains a message to display in log in ClientSceneController.

      • run

        public void run()
        Scans the user's folder every 1s, looking for changes. Sends the new files to server. Finishes when the ListeningThread Thread is dead (the user logged out).
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
